    Kinship Tutorial Tutorial

    PA-FGRS

    pa_fgrs.Rd

    Compute posterior mean and variance of liability of index person given disease status, thresholds and proportion of risk observed in relatives.

    Usage

    pa_fgrs(
  rel_status,
  thr = NA,
  rel_thr = rep(thr, length(rel_status)),
  rel_w = rep(1, length(rel_status)),
  covmat,
  i_status = NA,
  i_thr = thr,
  i_w = 1,
  conditional.mix = T
)

    Arguments

    rel_status

    vector with status of relatives 1=affected, 0=not affected, NA= missing

    thr

    threshold value used for all individuals (relatives and index person)

    rel_thr

    optional vector of specific threshold for each relative

    rel_w

    optional vector of proportion of risk experienced by each relative

    covmat

    covariance matrix of liabilities. First row and column correspoding to index person,subsequent rows and columns corresponding to relatives.

    i_status

    optional status of index person, if to be considered 1=affected, 0=not affected, NA= missing

    i_thr

    optional specific threshold for index person

    i_w

    optional proportion of risk experienced by index person

    conditional.mix

    logical indicator of wether the mixture of proportions should be conditional (default=TRUE).

    Examples

    pa_fgrs(c(0,1),qnorm(.9),covmat = matrix(c(.5,.25,.25,.25,1,.25,.25,.25,1),3))
#>     postM   postVar 
#> 0.3695726 0.4311061
